meanings.definition: A white or gray opaque scar on the cornea of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that a leukoma on the cornea can affect vision.
meanings.sent2: She had a small leukoma on her cornea that didn't cause any problems.
meanings.sent3: The leukoma on the cornea looked like a tiny cloud floating in her eye.
meanings.sent4: Her leukoma was a ghostly reminder of the injury she had sustained.
meanings.sent5: The leukoma on the cornea resembled a patch of snow on a clear window.

meanings.definition: A white or gray opaque area on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The leukoma on his skin was a result of an old injury.
meanings.sent2: She applied cream to the leukoma on her skin to reduce its appearance.
meanings.sent3: The leukoma on his skin made him look like a walking canvas.
meanings.sent4: The leukoma on her skin was a stark contrast to her otherwise smooth complexion.
meanings.sent5: The white leukoma on his skin stood out like a lone cloud in the sky.
